section.46: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: Uthman bin Abi Al-Walid said:"I heard 'Urwah bin Az-Zubair say: "Aishah used to narrate that he Prophet of Allah said: The hand (of the thief) should not be cut off except for a shield or its equivalent in value. And he said that 'Urwah said: A shield is (worth) four Dirhams
